name: Assault of Order
description:
Assault of order is a strategic game where 2 persons fight each other for the survival of their squad. 

As a player, you will have in disposition a team of 4 characters. Each of them will have their own ability to be able to help their comrades or  weaken the opposite team. 

Like chess, you will not be able to attack your rival from anywhere on the map, you will have to move on the map to be able to have your opponent in your firing line to shoot them.

If strategy and making punitive choices don't scare you, then do not hesitate!

 However, do not forget that to win the game you need to :

Assault your opponent, 

Impose your battle array 

And finally Expunge your rival!
